tosdr.case: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data

title: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data
quoteText:
If you have any questions about this Policy or want to correct or update your information, please email us at support@attendify.com.

You can also write to us or call at:

  • 75 E. Santa Clara St., 6th Floor
